direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods involve transferring assets but to different recipients (sub-account vs. master account).
Both methods involve asset transfer operations with similar parameter checks and request handling.
Both methods involve transferring assets between accounts, making test cases for one method applicable to the other.

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the initialization of the RequestHandler for sending signed requests.
Both methods require checking for mandatory parameters before proceeding with the transfer.

enhanced_by.method_name: sendSignedRequest(String, String, Map<String, Object>, HttpMethod, boolean)
enhanced_by.reason: Both methods use the sendSignedRequest method to execute the transfer, making the exception handling and response verification similar.
